short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast forward advertising content inside videos which can’t be blocked by usual adblockers or removed with YouTube Premium…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast forward advertising content inside videos which can’t be blocked by usual adblockers or removed with YouTube Premium subscription.

Fuflo simply fast-forwards junk part of the video, so you will never have to watch an ad that has been hardcoded into the video.
